title: According to the Fashion Set, It's Officially a Sardine Summer—35 Picks They Can't Get Enough Of
description: The tinned-fish trend is in full effect.
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
excerpt: The tinned-fish trend is in full effect.
text: One look at the fashion landscape for summer 2025, and there is one whimsical trend that stands out above the rest: sardine everything. Recently, it was all about tomatoes, but now these tinned fish have taken over everything from our cupboards to our closets. I, for one, have completely embraced this, having an affinity for tinned fish and a personal connection to them since childhood.Below, I rounded up a curated list of the best sardine-themed finds online right now, at a variety of price points ranging from Bottega Veneta to J.Crew and H&M. You'll discover everything from Staud's viral beaded bags to fun graphic tees to a variety of chic accessories. The jewelry alone is worth checking out. Thirty-five fashion people-approved sardine picks are just a scroll away.Shop the Sardine Trend J.Crew Relaxed-Fit "Sardines" Graphic T-Shirt STAUD Tommy Beaded Shoulder Bag ELOQUII Printed Full Skirt This skirt is easy to dress up or down. J.Crew Nautical Pearl Fish Charm Necklace abercrombie & fitch Sardines Graphic Scoopneck Tank Wear with everything from jeans to shorts to skirts. Alighieri Black & Gold 'the Gone Fishing' Necklace Love that this is on sale right now. BOTTEGA VENETA Sardine Intrecciato Leather Tote Clare V. Oversized Sweatshirt — Liberez Les Sardines Bring on the whimsical pieces. Free People Gone Fishing Beaded Wallet One Free People reviewer shared, "I love it! It is made so well holds my credit cards, my driver's license, and my insurance cards. It's great!" Frasier Sterling Sardines Baseball Cap For those off-duty moments. An affordable way to try the trend. Shopbop Clare V. Sardine Fob Bag charms are have a major moment. Maeve Sardine Linen Blend Graphic Tee The beading makes this tee a standout. Staud Tommy Beaded Shoulder Bag Speaking of statement beading… MANGO Textured Fish Earrings A minimalist take on the trend. Staud Giada Fish-Print Crewneck Sweater OLYMPIA LE-TAN Sardines Embroidered Appliquéd Canvas Clutch Clare V. Enamel Sardine Necklace This also comes in a yellow gold. Flat White The Mariel 3d Icon Longline Cardigan Sweater For chilly summer nights. BOTTEGA VENETA EYEWEAR Sardine Oval-Frame Gold-Tone Sunglasses Lisa Says Gah Alex Tee x Fishwife Quick—this one is selling out fast. STAUD Laura Linen Mini Dress J.Crew Tin Fish Graphic Tee For the tinned-fish girlies. Staud Staudines Tin Clutch This clutch will 100% get double-takes. Nothing like a head-turning bag. STAUD Winnie Printed Silk-Crepe Maxi Dress For an upcoming summer wedding. Clare V. Sardine Keychain Mignonne Gavigan Mariela Beaded Tinned Fish Drop Earrings Picture these with a pretty white dress. ELOQUII Roping Detail Printed Maxi Dress A dress that screams summer. Simply Sage Market Sardines Social Club Short Sleeve Graphic Tee It's a sardine-girl summer. ALIGHIERI The Catch of the Day Gold-Plated and Cord Necklace Aligheiri clearly got the memo. STAUD Tommy Beaded Shoulder Bag BOTTEGA VENETA Sardine Gold-Tone Enamel Earrings H&M Loose Fit Printed T-Shirt Great time to borrow from the men's department.
html:
One look at the fashion landscape for summer 2025, and there is one whimsical trend that stands out above the rest: sardine everything. Recently, it was all about tomatoes, but now these tinned fish have taken over everything from our cupboards to our closets. I, for one, have completely embraced this, having an affinity for tinned fish and a personal connection to them since childhood.

Below, I rounded up a curated list of the best sardine-themed finds online right now, at a variety of price points ranging from Bottega Veneta to J.Crew and H&M. You'll discover everything from Staud's viral beaded bags to fun graphic tees to a variety of chic accessories. The jewelry alone is worth checking out. Thirty-five fashion people-approved sardine picks are just a scroll away.
